meta.title: Home - Warren County Schools

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

div.p: "One Team, One Goal, High Levels of Learning for All"

li.a: Durham School Services - Bus Driver Employment Opportunities

input.placeholder: What can we help you find?
input.name: q

div.div: ● 29 Years with Warren County School System

div.br: ● July 1, 2012 Superintendent of Warren County Schools

p.a: Read more about John R. Cox, Ed. S.

div.p:
Welcome to the Warren County Schools website. Our purpose is to provide our students with a top quality public education so that they may become the successful, contributing citizens of the future.
Our school district consists of approximately 6500 students. We have 12 schools: 3 PK-5 grade elementary schools, 5 PK-8 grade schools, an alternative school, a middle school, a high school annex and a high school.
Warren County is the nursery capital of the World. Local growers ship their trees, plants and flowers to customers all over the United States. It’s a trade that has thrived in McMinnville for more than a century, thanks to the region’s fertile soil, mild climate and geographic location.
You are welcome to peruse our web site. Our school pages contain our curriculum for grades PK-12 as well as lists of activities and general school news.
We are proud of our district: our staff is working hard, our students are learning and our community gives us wonderful support. So please feel welcome to explore our web site and learn more about Warren County Schools.

p.span: Free Books Delivered to your Home for all rising 1st, 2nd, and 3rd graders in our District. The home address in Skyward is the location the books will be shipped this summer.
